speaking_tasks.title: Describing Your Favorite Room
speaking_tasks.main_prompt: Talk about the room you like best in your house. You should speak for 1-2 minutes.
cue_questions: Which room do you like best?
Why do you like it best?

structures: There are...in my house but I like...best.
From the window, I can see...
Whenever I need to relax, I usually...to enjoy...

warm_up_questions: How many rooms are there in your house?
What is your least favorite room? Why?
If you could add one piece of furniture to your favorite room, what would it be?
follow_up_questions: How would you redecorate your room if you had a lot of money?
Do you share your room with anyone? What are the advantages and disadvantages?
Describe a memorable moment that happened in that room.

role_play_scenario.title: House Tour with a Friend
role_play_scenario.setting: You are showing your foreign friend around your house for the first time via a video call.
role_play_scenario.instructions: Start by welcoming your friend. Describe your favorite room using the cues and useful language. Your friend should listen and then ask at least two follow-up questions about the room or the furniture in it.
